definition: A place within a lodging establishment where guests can stay temporarily, typically equipped with a bed, furniture, and amenities, such as a bathroom and sometimes a kitchenette. It is commonly used to refer to a specific type of accommodation within a hotel.

examples.english: The hotel room is very spacious.

examples.german: Unser Hotelzimmer hat einen schönen Ausblick auf den See.
examples.english: Our hotel room has a beautiful view of the lake.

examples.german: Das Hotelzimmer verfügt über kostenloses WLAN.
examples.english: The hotel room has free Wi-Fi.

examples.german: Ich habe ein Einzelzimmer im Hotel gebucht.
examples.english: I booked a single room at the hotel.

examples.german: Das Hotelzimmer ist sauber und komfortabel.
examples.english: The hotel room is clean and comfortable.
